Invoke a spreadsheet like viewer when appropriate.

Source: R/view.R
view.Rd

Invoke a spreadsheet like viewer when appropriate.

view(x, ..., title = wrapr_deparse(substitute(x)), n = 200)

Arguments

x

R object to view

...

force later arguments to bind by name.

title

title for viewer

n

number of rows to show

Value

invoke view or format object

Examples


view(mtcars)
#> 
#>
